item.title: OSU Cascades latest building is expected to be open by Janua
item.description: OSU Cascades latest building is expected to be open by January. Check out the full report here:

item.title: The Daughters of the American Revolution's Bend chapter prom
item.description: The Daughters of the American Revolution's Bend chapter promotes Constitution (Sept. 17-23) in Central Oregon, with numerous city council proclamations and events planned.

item.title: UPDATE: A report of shots fired brought Bend Police to the a
item.description: UPDATE: A report of shots fired brought Bend Police to the area of Second Street near Franklin Avenue this afternoon. Police say no one was injured and a person of interest is in custody. Isabella Warren KTVZ reported live from the scene, where crime scene tape has an area closed and a handgun is visible on the street.
